description:
1. Version: openstack 2.0.1
2. Relevant log files:
<class 'ironicclient.exc.AmbiguousAuthSystem'> (HTTP 500) (Request-ID: req-bff575c9-b83a-45c7-ac32-ab7defedd81a)
3.
im using devstack and i have 2 node. In my compute node, i did on my folder "/devstack":
 - source openrc admin admin
 - nova baremetal-node-list

 result: i got this error (500)
title: launch this command line(under ubuntu) : nova baremetal-node-list

comments.content:
What is openstack 2.0.1?

Looks like you probably have some config issue with your auth setup?  Are you using some specific ubuntu product for openstack?  We need more details here.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mriedem
